checkSSOToken.SERVICE_NAME:
Select *
From Token
Where id = ?
AND NOW() < DATE_ADD(expire ,INTERVAL 1 Minute)
AND used = 'N'
AND status = '1'
AND token is not null
checkSSOToken.aop_point_class:
import com.stuko.anaconda.business.*;
import java.lang.*;

Object object = result.getReturnObject("checkSSOToken");
if(object != null){
BusinessCollection bc = (BusinessCollection)object;
if(bc != null && bc.size() > 0){
request.setActionParamValue("ChannelId",bc.getBusinessData(0).getFieldValue("account"));
request.setActionParamValue("Vendor",bc.getBusinessData(0).getFieldValue("site"));
request.setActionParamValue("BotName",bc.getBusinessData(0).getFieldValue("BotName"));
}else{
result.setNextPage("/");
}
}else{
result.setNextPage("/");
}
